dt: {bc}given to excessive use of intoxicating liquors

et: Middle English {it}intemperat{/it}, from Latin {it}intemperatus{/it}, from {it}in-{/it} + {it}temperatus{/it}, past participle of {it}temperare{/it} to temper
shortdef: not temperate; especially : given to excessive use of intoxicating liquors
